snippet: Denver will be without cornerback Aqib Talib after he was suspended by the league for a game after hitting the Colts’ Dwayne Allen with a Three Stooges-esque eye poke.
lead_paragraph: Denver will be without cornerback Aqib Talib after he was suspended by the league for a game after hitting the Colts’ Dwayne Allen with a Three Stooges-esque eye poke.

headline.main: Kansas City Chiefs at Denver Broncos Preview
